Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class FileSystemOptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.FileSystemOptionBuilder
  • public class FileSystemOptionBuilder
extends Object

    Responsible for creating new instances of FileSystemOption.

    Example code: 

     FileSystemOption fileSystem;
 // create a file system with no parameters
 fileSystem = new FileSystemOptionBuilder().withClass("org.example.FileSystem").build();
 
 // create a file system with parameters
 Map<String, String> parameters = new HashMap<String, String>();
 parameters.put("param1", "value1");
 parameters.put("param2", "value2");
 fileSystem = new FileSystemOptionBuilder() //
                      .withClass(org.example.FileSystem.class) //
                      .appendParameters(parameters) //
                      .appendParameter("param3", "value3") //
                      .build();
    See Also:
    FileSystemOptionsBuilder, LessOptions
